scripts.start: concurrently "yarn workspace bi-directional-app1 start" "yarn workspace bi-directional-app2 start"
scripts.build: concurrently "yarn workspace bi-directional-app1 build" "yarn workspace bi-directional-app2 build"
scripts.serve: concurrently "yarn workspace bi-directional-app1 serve" "yarn workspace bi-directional-app2 serve"
